text:
the attached patch makes the fckmodule use the "menu.xmap" mechanism. users no
longer have to patch the menu.xmap in the xhtml-module, which violates SOC.
instead, they can register the module in publication.xconf.

please apply.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18718
fix SOC wrt menu item generation.

adds two files, menu.xmap and config/menu.xsp, and fixes the readme.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I applied the patch. Thanks a lot!
